edu.ucla.sspace.index
Interface DoubleVectorGenerator<T extends DoubleVector>

All Known Implementing Classes:
GaussianVectorGenerator
public interface DoubleVectorGenerator<T extends DoubleVector>

An interface for classes which will maintain and generate random DoubleVectors. The main purpose of this of this class is to allow any algorithm that makes use of some sort of random vector, such as Random Indexing, can easily swap out the type of indexing used for experimentation purposes.

Method Summary
 T generateRandomVector(int length)
          Creates an VectorVector with the provided length.
